================================================================================
Changelog
================================================================================

v0.2.0 (Movement demo)
- Add custom cursors
- Allow zooming with the mouse wheel
- Allow selecting and moving individual units
- Play voice clips when selecting or moving units
- Show hitbox when hovering over a unit
- Display selected unit name and portrait in the UI
- Display (empty) inventory when a unit is selected
- Render units in their team's colour
- Render palisade
- Render map borders
- Add support for MIDI music
- Improve scrolling with the keyboard
- Load settings from a config file
- Fix seams occasionally showing between tiles

v0.1.0 (Initial release)
- Loads and renders a sample level (terrain and units)
- image-extractor utility
- texture-builder utility
- campaign-extractor utility
- audio-extractor utility
